General.Name: China Television Media Ltd
General.Description: China Television Media, Ltd. engages in the film and television (TV) production, and media advertising agency businesses in China. It is involved in the planning, investment, production, and distribution of series, including of TV dramas, new media TV dramas, movies, TV movies, and digital movies; film and TV products copyright management; film and TV technical services; film and TV co-production; organizes and operates various shows and TV competitions; and film and TV equipment leasing services. The company also provides advertising agency services to CCTV-10 science and education channel; and CCTV-17 agricultural and rural channel. In addition, it operates tourist attractions comprising Wuxi film and TV base; and Nanhai film and TV base, as well as engages in the fund business. China Television Media, Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China. China Television Media, Ltd. is a subsidiary of CCTV Wuxi Taihu film and Television city.

5.Name: Mr. Hong Wei Liu
5.Title: Internal Control Director, Audit Mang. and Employee Representative Member of the Supervisory Board
